extensionDescription.message: Extension replaces default download manager by wxDownload Fast.

downloadAll.message: Download all links with wxDownload Fast

wxdfastUpgrade.message: Please upgrade wxDownload Fast to the latest version

text003.message: Minimum file size (in KB) required to interrupt the download

text005.message: If server does not provide Content-Type, wxDownload Fast will interrupt the file based on minimum file size to interrupt.

text008.message: Interrupt files with these MIME types

text009.message: Skip files with these MIME types

text010.message: This feature checks for URLs containing the keywords. Therefore you can use .fileExtension to interrupt/skip URLs containing file type. Eg: (.pdf, .jpg)
